nodes.text: Hoth: Under the Ice, Part 2: Steady, Girl
Hoth: Under the Ice, Part 2: Steady, Girl is an article written by Cory J. Herndon, and published by Wizards of the Coast on December 11, 2003.
In this tale, corporal Vyn Rolado and the Alliance engineers arrive on Hoth and carve out the tunnels that will become Echo Base.
